content:
# Task: Expert Level Learning Path with Complex Prerequisites

## Objective
Create an Expert Level chapter in the Python Roadmap with sophisticated prerequisite chains that require deep understanding of the existing course structure.

## Requirements

### 1. Create Expert Level Chapter
- **Database**: Chapters database
- **Properties**:
  - Name: `Expert Level`
  - Icon: ðŸŸ£ (purple circle emoji)
  - Must appear after Advanced Level in the database

### 2. Create Bridge Lesson
Create a lesson that bridges advanced and expert content:
- **Title**: `Advanced Foundations Review`
- **Status**: Done
- **Chapter**: Link to Expert Level
- **Parent item**: Link to the lesson that currently has status "In Progress" and contains "Control" in its title
- **Sub-items**: Must link to exactly these three lessons:
  - The lesson with title containing "Decorators"
  - The lesson with title containing "Calling API"
  - The lesson with title containing "Regular Expressions"

### 3. Create Expert Level Lessons
Add exactly 4 expert lessons to the Steps database:

**Lesson 1**: `Metaprogramming and AST Manipulation`
- Status: To Do
- Chapter: Expert Level
- Parent item: Link to "Advanced Foundations Review"
- Date: 2025-09-15

**Lesson 2**: `Async Concurrency Patterns`
- Status: To Do
- Chapter: Expert Level
- Parent item: Link to the lesson titled "Calling API"
- Date: 2025-09-20

**Lesson 3**: `Memory Management and GC Tuning`
- Status: In Progress
- Chapter: Expert Level
- Parent item: Link to "Advanced Foundations Review"
- Sub-item: Must have exactly 2 links:
  - Link to any lesson from "Data Structures" that has status "To Do"
  - Link to the lesson containing "OOP" in its title
- Date: 2025-09-25

**Lesson 4**: `Building Python C Extensions`
- Status: To Do
- Chapter: Expert Level
- Parent item: Link to "Metaprogramming and AST Manipulation"
- Date: 2025-10-01

### 4. Update Existing Lessons
- Change the status of "Decorators" from "To Do" to "Done"
- Add "Async Concurrency Patterns" as a Sub-item to "Error Handling"
- Update "Control Flow" status from "In Progress" to "Done"

### 5. Create Learning Path Notes
Add content to the "Advanced Foundations Review" lesson page:
- **Block 1**: Heading 2 with text `Prerequisites Checklist`
- **Block 2**: Bulleted list with exactly 3 items:
  - `âœ… Advanced Python Features (Decorators, Context Managers)`
  - `âœ… API Integration and Async Basics`
  - `âœ… Pattern Matching and Text Processing`
- **Block 3**: Paragraph with text: `This lesson serves as a checkpoint before entering expert-level content. Ensure you have mastered all prerequisites listed above.`

Note: Based on your understanding, solve the task all at once by yourself, don't ask for my opinions on anything.

content.text: I'll help you create this expert-level learning path with complex prerequisites. Let me start by discovering what's available in the Notion database and then execute the task step by step.

arguments: {"user_query": "notion database pages create update chapters steps", "server_names": ["Notion"]}
name: discover_server_categories_or_actions

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"servers\\\":{\\\"Notion\\\":{\\\"detail_level\\\":\\\"categories_only\\\",\\\"details\\\":[\\\"NOTION_USERS\\\",\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\",\\\"NOTION_SEARCH\\\",\\\"NOTION_BLOCKS\\\",\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\",\\\"NOTION_COMMENTS\\\"]}}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"category_actions\\\":{\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\":[\\\"post_database_query\\\",\\\"create_a_database\\\",\\\"update_a_database\\\",\\\"retrieve_a_database\\\"],\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\":[\\\"retrieve_a_page\\\",\\\"patch_page\\\",\\\"post_page\\\",\\\"retrieve_a_page_property\\\"],\\\"NOTION_BLOCKS\\\":[\\\"get_block_children\\\",\\\"patch_block_children\\\",\\\"retrieve_a_block\\\",\\\"update_a_block\\\",\\\"delete_a_block\\\"]}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Now let me get the detailed information about the key actions I'll need:

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_database_query\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"POST\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/databases/{database_id}/query\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Query a database\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{\\\"database_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"Identifier for a Notion database.\\\"}},\\\"query_params\\\":{\\\"filter_properties\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":false,\\\"description\\\":\\\"A list of page property value IDs associated with the database. Use this param to limit the response to a specific page property value or values for pages that meet the `filter` criteria.\\\"}},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"filter\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"When supplied, limits which pages are returned based on the [filter conditions](ref:post-database-query-filter).\\\"},\\\"sorts\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"When supplied, orders the results based on the provided [sort criteria](ref:post-database-query-sort).\\\",\\\"items\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"property\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"direction\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"property\\\",\\\"direction\\\"]}},\\\"start_cursor\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"When supplied, returns a page of results starting after the cursor provided. If not supplied, this endpoint will return the first page of results.\\\"},\\\"page_size\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"integer\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100\\\"},\\\"archived\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"boolean\\\"},\\\"in_trash\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"boolean\\\"}}},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_page\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"POST\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/pages\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Create a page\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{},\\\"query_params\\\":{},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"parent\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"page_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"page_id\\\"]},\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"title\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"type\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"title\\\"]},\\\"children\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The content to be rendered on the new page, represented as an array of [block objects](https://developers.notion.com/reference/block).\\\",\\\"items\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\"}},\\\"icon\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The icon of the new page. Either an [emoji object](https://developers.notion.com/reference/emoji-object) or an [external file object](https://developers.notion.com/reference/file-object)..\\\",\\\"format\\\":\\\"json\\\"},\\\"cover\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The cover image of the new page, represented as a [file object](https://developers.notion.com/reference/file-object).\\\",\\\"format\\\":\\\"json\\\"}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"parent\\\",\\\"properties\\\"]},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"patch_page\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"PATCH\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/pages/{page_id}\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Update page properties\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{\\\"page_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The identifier for the Notion page to be updated.\\\"}},\\\"query_params\\\":{},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The property values to update for the page. The keys are the names or IDs of the property and the values are property values. If a page property ID is not included, then it is not changed.\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"title\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"type\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"title\\\"]},\\\"in_trash\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"boolean\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Set to true to delete a block. Set to false to restore a block.\\\"},\\\"archived\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"boolean\\\"},\\\"icon\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"A page icon for the page. Supported types are [external file object](https://developers.notion.com/reference/file-object) or [emoji object](https://developers.notion.com/reference/emoji-object).\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"emoji\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"emoji\\\"]},\\\"cover\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"A cover image for the page. Only [external file objects](https://developers.notion.com/reference/file-object) are supported.\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"external\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"type\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"external\\\"]}}},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"patch_block_children\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"PATCH\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/blocks/{block_id}/children\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Append block children\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{\\\"block_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"Identifier for a [block](ref:block). Also accepts a [page](ref:page) ID.\\\"}},\\\"query_params\\\":{},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"children\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Child content to append to a container block as an array of [block objects](ref:block)\\\",\\\"items\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"paragraph\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"bulleted_list_item\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"type\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}}}},\\\"after\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The ID of the existing block that the new block should be appended after.\\\"}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"children\\\"]},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Now I need to query the existing databases to understand the current structure. Let me search for the database IDs first:

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"query\\\":\\\"database search list all\\\",\\\"server_name\\\":\\\"Notion\\\",\\\"results\\\":[{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_database_query\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Query a database\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_search\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Search by title\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_SEARCH\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"update_a_database\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Update a database\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"patch_page\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Update page properties\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_page_property\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Retrieve a page property item\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_page\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Create a page\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"get_users\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"List all users\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_USERS\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_comment\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Retrieves a list of un-resolved [Comment objects](ref:comment-object) from a page or block.\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_COMMENTS\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"get_block_children\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Retrieve block children\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_BLOCKS\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"update_a_block\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Update a block\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_BLOCKS\\\"}],\\\"total_results\\\":10}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Let me get the search action to find existing databases:

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_search\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"POST\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/search\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Search by title\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{},\\\"query_params\\\":{},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"query\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The text that the API compares page and database titles against.\\\"},\\\"sort\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"A set of criteria, `direction` and `timestamp` keys, that orders the results. The **only** supported timestamp value is `\\\\\\\"last_edited_time\\\\\\\"`. Supported `direction` values are `\\\\\\\"ascending\\\\\\\"` and `\\\\\\\"descending\\\\\\\"`. If `sort` is not provided, then the most recently edited results are returned first.\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"direction\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The direction to sort. Possible values include `ascending` and `descending`.\\\"},\\\"timestamp\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The name of the timestamp to sort against. Possible values include `last_edited_time`.\\\"}}},\\\"filter\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"A set of criteria, `value` and `property` keys, that limits the results to either only pages or only databases. Possible `value` values are `\\\\\\\"page\\\\\\\"` or `\\\\\\\"database\\\\\\\"`. The only supported `property` value is `\\\\\\\"object\\\\\\\"`.\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"value\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The value of the property to filter the results by.  Possible values for object type include `page` or `database`.  **Limitation**: Currently the only filter allowed is `object` which will filter by type of object (either `page` or `database`)\\\"},\\\"property\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The name of the property to filter by. Currently the only property you can filter by is the object type.  Possible values include `object`.   Limitation: Currently the only filter allowed is `object` which will filter by type of object (either `page` or `database`)\\\"}}},\\\"start_cursor\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"A `cursor` value returned in a previous response that If supplied, limits the response to results starting after the `cursor`. If not supplied, then the first page of results is returned. Refer to [pagination](https://developers.notion.com/reference/intro#pagination) for more details.\\\"},\\\"page_size\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"integer\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The number of items from the full list to include in the response. Maximum: `100`.\\\",\\\"format\\\":\\\"int32\\\"}}},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Let me search for databases first to find the Chapters and Steps databases:

Perfect! I found the databases:
- Steps database ID: 27460215-0acf-819f-bc2e-fdbd323f6837
- Chapters database ID: 27460215-0acf-8163-8edd-c9c1af601563

Now let me query the Chapters database to see the existing chapters:

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"server_name\\\":\\\"Notion\\\",\\\"action_name\\\":\\\"post_database_query\\\",\\\"execution_result\\\":{\\\"success\\\":true,\\\"data\\\":{\\\"results\\\":[{\\\"id\\\":\\\"27460215-0acf-812d-9cbe-c7f819601ce1\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"Name\\\":{\\\"title\\\":[{\\\"plain_text\\\":\\\"Beginner Level\\\"}]}}},{\\\"id\\\":\\\"27460215-0acf-816c-9a67-cd1767810c16\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"Name\\\":{\\\"title\\\":[{\\\"plain_text\\\":\\\"Advanced Level\\\"}]}}},{\\\"id\\\":\\\"27460215-0acf-81e1-8f17-c6c31df631e1\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"Name\\\":{\\\"title\\\":[{\\\"plain_text\\\":\\\"Intermediate Level\\\"}]}}}]},\\\"status_code\\\":200}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Now let me query the Steps database to understand the current lessons structure:
I need to get more detailed information about the lessons to identify specific ones by their titles. Let me get the full titles, statuses, and relationships:

The response is showing empty results for the properties. Let me retrieve detailed information about individual pages to understand their properties. Let me start with a single page to understand the structure:

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_page\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"GET\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/pages/{page_id}\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Retrieve a page\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{\\\"page_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"Identifier for a Notion page\\\"}},\\\"query_params\\\":{\\\"filter_properties\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":false,\\\"description\\\":\\\"A list of page property value IDs associated with the page. Use this param to limit the response to a specific page property value or values. To retrieve multiple properties, specify each page property ID. For example: `?filter_properties=iAk8&filter_properties=b7dh`.\\\"}},\\\"body_schema\\\":{},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"server_name\\\":\\\"Notion\\\",\\\"action_name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_page\\\",\\\"execution_result\\\":{\\\"success\\\":true,\\\"data\\\":{},\\\"status_code\\\":200}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Let me try without include_output_fields to see the full structure:

Great! Now I can see the structure. This lesson is "Data Structures" with Status "To Do". I need to continue searching for specific lessons mentioned in the requirements. Let me check a few more lessons to identify the ones I need:

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"server_name\\\":\\\"Notion\\\",\\\"action_name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_page\\\",\\\"execution_result\\\":{\\\"success\\\":true,\\\"data\\\":{\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"Lessons\\\":{\\\"title\\\":[{\\\"plain_text\\\":\\\"Introduction\\\"}]},\\\"Status\\\":{\\\"status\\\":{\\\"name\\\":\\\"Done\\\"}},\\\"Chapters\\\":{\\\"relation\\\":[{\\\"id\\\":\\\"27460215-0acf-812d-9cbe-c7f819601ce1\\\"}]}}},\\\"status_code\\\":200}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text:
Great! Now I have all the key lesson IDs I need:

Now I can start implementing the tasks. First, let me create the Expert Level chapter:

content.text: I see that the Chapters database only has Name, Steps, and Progress properties. There's no Icon property. Let me create the Expert Level chapter with just the Name:
